articles.author: Sara Moniuszko
articles.title: Chronic fatigue syndrome affects 3.3 million Americans, the CDC estimates. Here's what to know about symptoms and treatment. - CBS News
articles.description: The CDC released the first nationally representative estimate of how many Americans have chronic fatigue syndrome. Here's what to know about causes, symptoms and treatment.
articles.content:
About 3.3 million U.S. adults have chronic fatigue syndrome, according to new data from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
The number is the first nationally representative estimate of … [+4914 chars]
